prizes.title: Custom Domain
prizes.description: A custom domain of your choosing linked to your own web app, game, or portfolio

prizes.title: Gift Card
prizes.description: $100 Giftcard from Best Buy, Apple Store, Google Play, PlayStation Network, Xbox

tasks.description: + Fill out session sign up form at least 24 hours before session
Send a message on Slack at least once during the week
Send at least 10 Slack messages during the week
Complete a task from your project board
Create a social media post about your project, and tag Dev Launchers!
Refer someone to the Ignition Program!
